name: is_holyday
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool enoch_calendar.
Tool description: Access the Biblical Holydays and Sabbaths using the Enoch Calendar
API description: Get the Holyday, corresponding Scritpures and if this Holyday is also a Sabbath from the supplied date string or today's date. Or false in for all returned properties

datestring.description: The date string to check for holyday status.
